mastermindError: You have to change color of every ball first

mastermindTips.2: Click on the circle to change its color
mastermindTips.3: Click 'check' button to see if you found the right combination
mastermindTips.4: After checking you may see some number of white/black circles next to your combination. White circle means that you guessed one of the balls' colors correctly, but placed it in the wrong spot. Black circle means that you guessed one of the balls correctly (both color and position)
mastermindTips.5: Your goal is to guess the right combination of colors
mastermindTips.6: You get points based on the number of turns you needed and overall time it took you to complete the task

memoryTips.2: Click on the image you want to uncover
memoryTips.3: Click on the second image and, if they are not the same, try to remember their content and position, as they will cover back in a moment
memoryTips.4: If the pictures were the same, they will disappear and you don't have to think of them anymore
memoryTips.5: You get points for clearing the board
memoryTips.6: The fewer turns and time you spend, the more points you'll get

minesweeperTips.2: Click with your left mouse button on the hidden square
minesweeperTips.3: You can uncover 3 types of fields:
minesweeperTips.4: The field doesn't have any bomb nearby,
minesweeperTips.5: The field has as many bombs on the fields around it, as the number tells (e.g. this field has five bombs on the fields around it),
minesweeperTips.6: You were unlucky to find the bomb, the game is over. You can try again
minesweeperTips.7: Your task is to uncover all of the fields that are not bombs
minesweeperTips.8: Click with your right mouse button to place a flag. It will help you to remember where you think the bombs are
minesweeperTips.9: You get points based on the completion time (you don't get any points if you uncover the bomb)
minesweeperTips.10: On harder levels the board is bigger and there are more bombs, but you get more points too

whackamoleTips.2: Click on the black circle as fast as you can
whackamoleTips.4: On harder levels time is shorter and the moles' hide speed is faster, but you also get more points

combinationsTips.2: First you will see the combination you need to remember
combinationsTips.3: When the clock starts you have to repeat combination by clicking on right images
combinationsTips.4: When the time is up or you missorder images the game is over

solitaireTips.2: You need to arrange the cards in sequence: King, Queen, Jack, 10, 9, ..., 2, Ace, and in the correct suit
solitaireTips.3: To do this, you need to move cards around, but you cannot place cards on top of each other if they don't match the sequence or are the wrong color (you can place black on red and vice versa, but this sequence cannot be moved afterward)
solitaireTips.4: If you run out of moves, you can add one card to each column by clicking on the "stack" of cards in the top right corner of the board
solitaireTips.5: The faster you do this, the more points you earn
solitaireTips.6: Sometimes, there might be no possible moves. In that case, you will need to restart the game
